description:
This serializer allow to set the type of an element and the element id before which
we want to insert the new element.

before_id.description: If provided, creates the element before the element with the given id.

type.description:
The type of the element.

* `heading` - heading
* `text` - text
* `link` - link
* `image` - image
* `input_text` - input_text
* `column` - column
* `button` - button
* `table` - table
* `repeat` - repeat
* `record_selector` - record_selector
* `form_container` - form_container
* `choice` - choice
* `checkbox` - checkbox
* `iframe` - iframe
* `datetime_picker` - datetime_picker
* `header` - header
* `footer` - footer
* `auth_form` - auth_form

parent_element_id.description: If provided, creates the element as a child of the element with the given id.

style_border_top_size.description: Pixel height of the top border.

style_padding_top.description: Padding size of the top border.

style_margin_top.description: Margin size of the top border.

style_border_bottom_size.description: Pixel height of the bottom border.

style_padding_bottom.description: Padding size of the bottom border.

style_margin_bottom.description: Margin size of the bottom border.

style_border_left_size.description: Pixel height of the left border.

style_padding_left.description: Padding size of the left border.

style_margin_left.description: Margin size of the left border.

style_border_right_size.description: Pixel height of the right border.

style_padding_right.description: Padding size of the right border.

style_margin_right.description: Margin size of the right border.

style_background.description:
What type of background the element should have.

* `none` - None
* `color` - Color
* `image` - Image

style_background_color.description: The background color if `style_background` is color.

style_background_mode.description:
The mode of the background image

* `tile` - Tile
* `fill` - Fill
* `fit` - Fit

style_width.description:
Indicates the width of the element.

* `full` - Full
* `full-width` - Full Width
* `normal` - Normal
* `medium` - Medium
* `small` - Small

label.description: The text label for this choice

required.description: Whether this form element is a required field.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text which should be applied to the element.

multiple.description: Whether this choice allows users to choose multiple values.

show_as_dropdown.description: Whether to show the choices as a dropdown.

formula_value.description: The value of the option if it is a formula

formula_name.description: The display name of the option if it is a formula
